title: Fix Fioras Face.
body: Her new face pisses me off for some reason. She just doesn't seem like a duelist. Pls rito.

replies.body: They really went overboard with the stuck up, french look. She looks like Cruella Devil now... Her old splash was much more on point, keeping her young and overconfident self.
she doesn't look 'stuck up french' so much as she looks downright inbred on that new splash...
She looks like a tranny.

Splash art is inferior in comparison and less sexy.... Where's the jojo pose and open lips vogue styleesque. Chin is really pronunciated, characteristic of old women and hair less detailed. I agree, she looks like Cruella D'vil now, and I fear that's the intention. inb4 shitty dudes posting it's now better by X Y motives.

I can't wait to see everone on boards raging about how balance/rework design is turn everything skillshot.

Also, do weak points rotate with the direction that champions are facing? Or remain static? Hate it when they don't display these details in order for us to go to leddit AMA's. Never submit.

I'm not sure but... why do all women have to look super pretty? I mean, personal taste aside I have to admit that she doesn't look bad either.

Also, Fiora Laurent cares about two things: 

1.) Fencing

2.) Being the very best, like no one ever was.

There is no room for being remarkably pretty in that. Leave that to champs like Ahri ^^
If that was true she'd not dye and stylize her hair like that.

Well, there is a difference in making a little effort in some individuality and trying to achieve maximal beauty. 

Her hair is even styled in a way so it does not fall into her eyes while fighting, because that could hinder her fighting skill.

Excuse me?

She doesn't have bangs and her hair is chin long.

Unless she glues it, it will get in the way.

And what if... that "glue" is pink (after all we have no idea how demacian hairstyling products work)?  ^^ In that case the color of her hair is just a side effect of her keeping her hair out of her face...

If you've ever had hair long enough to fall past your eyes, you'll know that it's actually not a problem at all to see through a blanket of hair over your eyes. I'd argue that with the right hair density it could even be advantageous in a duel, as the opponent would be unable to see Fiora's eyes and thus would find it harder to predict her moves.
She's not "better looking" in her current splash. She actually fits the game art style. New Fiora looks right out of a disney movie.

> [{quoted}](name=Kyoki Shinkuro,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Mef4ZWEr,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-07-21T19:08:05.054+0000)

> I'm not sure but... why do all women have to look super pretty? I mean, personal taste aside I have to admit that she doesn't look bad either.
> 
> Also, Fiora Laurent cares about two things: 
> 
> 1.) Fencing
> 
> 2.) Being the very best, like no one ever was.
> 
> There is no room for being remarkably pretty in that. Leave that to champs like Ahri ^^

Not all women have to be pretty, but why does Fiora? Because before this disgusting downgrade (art and model) she was one of the pretty characters. Now she looks like trash, her models are trash her running animation is beyond stupid. Like it's just terrible. I'd prefer they just delete her before making this god aweful change

> [{quoted}](name=Kyoki Shinkuro,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Mef4ZWEr,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-07-21T19:08:05.054+0000)
>
> I'm not sure but... why do all women have to look super pretty? I mean, personal taste aside I have to admit that she doesn't look bad either.
> 
> Also, Fiora Laurent cares about two things: 
> 
> 1.) Fencing
> 
> 2.) Being the very best, like no one ever was.
> 
> There is no room for being remarkably pretty in that. Leave that to champs like Ahri ^^

Your logic is wrong and here is why.  Fiora is a DUELIST.  Not a pit fighter.  A DUELIST.  As in, she is a noblewoman and fights against other noblemen and women for honor and glory.  She is the archetypical swashbuckler and they are know for being fashionable, often good-looking and rather vain.  She is all of those things.  It's not enough to simple beat someone down.  She has to do with with skill, grace and style.  Her entire VO puts a lot of emphasis on this.  Her hair.  The stylish cape.  She is an aristocrat AND a warrior and that is what makes her different than someone like Garen.  She fights for prestige... and anyone who wants others to think well of them tends to their appearance.  She WANTS to look good and also leave you bleeding.  That's the point.
She looks incredibly cartoony. I agree. Change it please.
she's not as sexy anymore imo

No, it's not just her face. It's everything. This splash is fucking disgusting compared to the old one. They don't need to fix her face, they need to scrap this piece of art entirely.

You are right in your criticism, but please don't suggest the splash is salvagable by edits. It isn't.

but the new breast plate looks better.
Can we edit that into the old one?
Well... It's better than Ekko and Ekko's hair.
Her face has a weird triangle shape from her cheekbones to her chin. Make it more round and less starved.
Fix Face and Hair plz {{champion:114}}
They fixed it today : http://www.surrenderat20.net/2015/07/722-pbe-update.html

> [{quoted}](name=ZadesUmagu,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Mef4ZWEr,comment-id=0012,timestamp=2015-07-22T22:46:27.173+0000)
>
> They fixed it today : http://www.surrenderat20.net/2015/07/722-pbe-update.html

No, they really didn't.
[](http://3.bp.blogspot.com/_-BaZqeExj_g/S61gJv7t_4I/AAAAAAAAAPo/F5C6zDuYLHY/s400/VanillaSky_07.jpg)

IMO, they should change her nose's color and bring back the red stripe.

With this design I have no idea why it had to be changed.
I agree she looks allot older than she does in her old splash art {{champion:114}}  but the model looks sweet
I agree that her face seems a bit odd in the splash art,but I think it looks good ingame.
She looks like the lady from Ratatouille...{{champion:114}}

That chin of hers tho'. I bet they added few more AD points just for the possibility to impale someone with it.

Also what is wrong with the Headmistress in game model? ... who the hell gave Daniel Radclife face to her? Or did Harry Potter drank wrong potion?
I don't really think it's the face, for me it's the hair that bothers me.
And i thought Talon had cheekbone problems.

Her chin frightens me just a little.

Loving the Cara Delevigne eyebrows though.
not every female has to look like perfect and in her mid 20s???
